content.text:
# 2007 Kisima Music Awards

The 2007 Kisima Music Awards took place at Marula Manor, Nairobi, Kenya on 8 September 2007.
Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Category
! Winner (Artist - Track)
|-
| Afro Fusion
| Eric Wainaina - KAMARE
|-

| Jua Cali - Bidii Yangu
|-

| Amani - Missing My Baby
|-

| Nonini & P-Unit - Si Lazima
|-
| Contemporary Gospel
| Astar - Close Your eyes
|-
| Eastern Benga
| John De'Mathew - Kiuria Kinene
|-

|-

|-
| Lifetime Achievement Award
| James Onyango Joel
|}
